mapper.insert: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS crowd_qna_reply_#{crowdId}( qna_reply_id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , crowd_qna_id INT NOT NULL , crowd_id INT default #{crowdId}, user_id INT NOT NULL, qna_reply_content VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL , published_at DATETIME DEFAULT now() , updated_at DATETIME DEFAULT now(), is_deleted BOOL default false );
mapper.select: SELECT qna_reply_id AS qnaReplyId , crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId, user_id AS userId, qna_reply_content AS qnaReplyContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_reply_#{crowd_id} ORDER BY qna_reply_id DESC

SELECT qna_reply_id AS qnaReplyId , crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId, user_id AS userId, qna_reply_content AS qnaReplyContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_reply_#{crowd_id} WHERE is_deleted = false

SELECT qna_reply_id AS qnaReplyId , crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId, user_id AS userId, qna_reply_content AS qnaReplyContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM crowd_qna_reply_#{crowdId} WHERE crowd_qna_id = #{crowdQnaId} AND is_deleted = false

SELECT qna_reply_id AS qnaReplyId , crowd_qna_id AS crowdQnaId , crowd_id AS crowdId, user_id AS userId, qna_reply_content AS qnaReplyContent , published_at AS publishedAt , updated_at AS updatedAt, is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM qna_reply_id_#{crowdId} WHERE qna_reply_id = #{qnaReplyId}
